home.title: Property Booking Assistant
home.description: Welcome to the Property Booking Assistant. This application helps you search, book, and manage property rentals. You can browse available properties, make bookings, read reviews, and get customer support.

property-search.title: Property Search
property-search.description: Search and browse available properties. Filter by location, price range, amenities, and more. View detailed property information and photos.

property-search-manage.title: Manage Properties
property-search-manage.description: Add, edit, or remove property listings. Update availability, pricing, and property details.

bookings.title: Bookings
bookings.description: View and manage your property bookings. Check availability, make reservations, and manage your upcoming stays.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.description: Read and write property reviews. Share your experience and help others make informed decisions.

support.title: Customer Support
support.description: Get help with your bookings, property listings, or any other questions. Our support team is here to assist you.
